resources.string: A little info about how this app should work..

In this app you can create profiles with information about your employees and see their personality test results. After creating different employees with the information needed, which you can do in Profiles - you can make comparisons between the different employees you have created in Compare.
Create a business user or log in if you have already created your user. Create profiles of your employees and start comparing the personality traits of your employees.

Get your employees to take a Big Five personality test from RubyNor. The personality test is scientific and based on 5 different categories: Neuroticism, planning, humanity, extroversion and openness to experience.
After employees take the test, use the ID from the test into our app, and get an overview of the various results from each profile, and compare employees and create good teams within your company.
Are you sure you want to delete this person?
The app is based on a previous assignment from the course APP2000.
This app is made by Marte-Marie Rønningen and Kjartan Øyen.
If you would like more information about how the personality test works, check out RubyNors website in the button in this box.
